nonPlayerDialogue.npcDialogue: Alright ladies, gentlemen and speed demons of all ages it's that time for the annual racing tournament
Let’s go over a refresher for all you newbies with us here today
There are three types of races
First off is the checkpoint race, you gotta get to the end of the track by following all the markers before the clock hits zero –
Each checkpoint passed adds to the clock and the race is won once all checkpoints have been passed.
